original_text: So the bad spirit goes out and it brings back seven other spirits. They are even worse than itself. They all go into the person and they live there. Now the person's life is even worse than it was before.’
korean_text: 이에 가서 저보다 더 악한 귀신 일곱을 데리고 들어가서 거하니 그 사람의 나중 형편이 전보다 더 심하게 되느니라

sentences.original_text: So the bad spirit goes out
and it brings back seven other spirits
sentences.korean_translation: 자기보다 더한 일곱 다른 영들을 데리고 온다

sentences.original_text: They are even worse than itself
They all go into the person
Now the person's life is even worse
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그 사람의 형편은 더 악해진다
